name: ECLAT
description: Eclat World is a Web 3.0 platform that aims to improve lives through its community- based profit -sharing models. These models will help build a sustainable global community while generating profits. Eclat is simple and secure platform for digital asset exposure, and Eclat new advance Technologies, via its subsidiaries, offers digital asset Exchange Traded Products (ELT) available via traditional banks, foreign exchange and brokers in Europe.
